channel.title: Author John Longenecker
channel.description: John Longenecker's selected hours on Talkradio, John's liberty message outside the liberty community homes.

item.title: With Cam and Company on NRANews
item.description: Comments on the recent UN position to confiscate U.S. weapons and how police have no duty to protectindividuals.

item.title: An Hour with Robby Noel
item.description: John Longenecker gives examples of how the Stand Your Ground Movement re-establishes the Values that make America the light of the world.

item.title: With Rick Adams on RBN [Hour One]
item.description: On personal authority and the nature of the relationship between officials and the governed.

item.title: With Rick Adams on RBN [Hour Two]
item.description: A caller from Illinois brings out John's solution to their present crime and political problem.

item.title: The MICHAEL DRESSER SHOW
item.description: John Longenecker on the fraud of go-nowhere anti-crime policies and how such policies draw more and more authority from the home for greater and greater dependency on agencies.
